sections.title: 3. PROGRAM MANAGEMENT
sections.content: The Seller shall provide management and administrative effort sufficient to complete the tasks defined by this SOW and the associated Contract. The Seller’s resources shall be committed to the extent necessary to provide the Buyer assurance that the requirements stated herein will be accomplished.

sections.title: 3.1 Program Management Plan (PMP)
sections.content: The Seller shall prepare and submit a PMP in accordance with SDRL 038. The Seller shall conduct Program Management in accordance with the Buyer approved PMP. The Seller shall prepare and submit an organizational chart of the Seller’s Program Management Organization in accordance with SDRL 039.

sections.title: 3.2 Reviews and Meetings
sections.content: Design reviews, audits, and Technical Interchange Meetings (TIMs) shall be held for verifying design and development compliance with technical requirements of Buyer’s Requirement Specification and Buyer’s Control Drawing. Agendas for these meetings shall be prepared and submitted in accordance with SDRL 041. The agenda should set forth the scope and purpose of the planned meeting, provide a schedule of events, and include any other information which may be of value to the attendees. Action items generated during meetings shall be documented by the Seller. Minutes of meetings shall be prepared and submitted in accordance with SDRL 002 to provide a record of the proceedings. When such reviews and meetings occur at the Seller’s plant, the Seller shall provide reasonable conference facilities and arrange for necessary secretarial assistance.
